messages.title: WE CAN’T GO ON LIKE THIS. IT’S TIME FOR CHANGE.
messages.content: The general election is just weeks away now. This is a big moment for Britain. It comes at a time when our economy is in deep trouble, our political system under barrage on sleaze and rebuild trust in how we need to mend. We can’t go on like this. Britain needs change to get the country back on its feet - heal the mistakes of the past and bring new ideas and energy for our future.

messages.title: This can be the year for change – and the Conservatives have the plans to make that a reality:
messages.content:
We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.
We will stand up for families, sort out our schools and fight back against crime.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for anyone else would only help Gordon Brown cling on to power.

issues.economy: This is a big moment for Britain. It comes at a time when our economy is in deep trouble.
issues.education: We will stand up for families, sort out our schools and fight back against crime.
issues.governance: Our political system [is] under barrage on sleaze and [we need to] rebuild trust in how we need to mend.
issues.health: We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

quotes.text:
As every family knows, the longer you leave a debt problem, the worse it gets.
We will cut the deficit, start to restore responsibility to our society.
We will take action to restore politics and bring transparency to Parliament.
